document.full_text: pending sales of existing u.s. homes dropped far more than expected in april to touch a seven-month low, a trade group said on friday, dealing a blow to hopes of a recovery in the housing market.
document.title: pending home sales plunge in april
lines_and_colors: pending sales of existing u.s. homes dropped far more than expected in april to touch a seven-month low, a trade group said on friday, dealing a blow to hopes of a recovery in the housing market.
